title: My skill level help
body: So I have been playing for a little over a year now and I feel my skill level is just staying where it is. I don't get any better and I would like to actually get out of bronze. I don't rage at my team mates at all so it couldn't be that and I have watched so many YouTube videos and they don't help if anyone would like to have a game or spectate a game of mine and tell me what I can improve on would be much appreciated

replies.body: I will spectate you :) add me ingame and lets go!
Well I got an over protective girlfriend that doesn't like me talking to girls /: bit of a pickle

I am a boy with a feminine name :D
Im just gonna watch a game (or two), write some notes based on that and your match history and flick you a google doc with custom improvement notes. You can delete me straight after.
Aight as long as you are a boy I get in enough fights she checks my friends list ðŸ˜‚ But thanks heaps I won't be home till a little bit later if that's okay?
All good, I will be on NA for a while anyway.
Hey I accepted your friends request feel free to spectate me about to shave a game
I'll be on in about an hour or two if you are keen I will add you on Skype or join a team speak?

I can teach you to be a better yasuo. Better than all the trash yasuo (95% of them) and win most matchups, even if they heavily counter him. Though annie is always 50/50. bloody point and click non consumable stun if you w... his w is so bugged. Can also teach you how to maneuver with e in jg, 100% success rate.
That would be mad I love playing yas just I'm not a good yas /: i am going to Japan tomorrow for 2 weeks but add me and I'll love that!
Ill send you an underling then!
Add me if you want and I should be on this account at some point soon.
I added you and I'm about to start a game
If you are awake now I'm happy to do it
Play some yi.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

Try recording your games, to see what you could do in order to improve.
Yeah I got a recording program I just don't know how to point out my problems

When did you ward, when you should have warded.
Was it safe too?
Should you have pressed or backed off.
Did you upgrade your trinket at lvl 9-10.
Is your CS about 80 per 10 mins.
Did you build items according to what your team needs and against the enemy team.
Stuff like that.

Many people make these mistakes all the time.
If you have spare time I would say watch a few of the videos I've gone over.
Some are funny in what summoners can do, some are cringy.
But you might be able to pick up what you could do better.

Here are some very helpful gametips to help you.

* CS,Your CS is very important as it is one of your main sources of gold. (15cs = 1kill).
* Don't flame your team.
* Play champs that you have experience with.
* Help out your team in anyway.
* Try and learn around 2-4 champions for each role.
* Abuse broken champs xddddddd
* Don't play too long.
Yeah I will go in custom games a bit more and practice Cs with Morgans

Just a few things I've picked up from your profile so far. Make sure your Runes and Masteries are efficient! Don't shoot yourself in the foot by not having the optimal stats!

Your Current Volibear Page:
HP - Marks/Quints
Armor - Seals
MR - Glyphs

Efficient Volibear Page
AS - Marks/Quints
Armor - Seals
Scaling MR - Glyphs

The HP is understandable to synergize in with Voli's Kit. However it's very easy for you to just build it into his Item Path. Attackspeed however works with his ultimate and stacking his W. Try running Attackspeed Marks and Quints with this page instead. This also helps your general clear speed and overall Damage Per Second a lot more. As a jungler you can go for scaling Magic Resist on Volibear. Not many mages can burst through your passive early which allows you some time to ramp up the scaling aspect.

For Masteries you typically should not run Grasp of the Undying in the jungle. You generally won't find much use of it in the game as your ganks will typically be over in less than 4seconds before it procs. Try going for the Strength of Ages Keystone. It will give you 300Bonus HP to synergize with your W and passive. Far more effective at giving you a good powerspike throughout the game.

Your ward count is very low and you don't swap to red trinket. In the jungle you don't always have to take the oracle lens, but its super effective at giving your team information as to what objectives can be taken sneakily. Regardless of swapping to this, place more wards! You have at least 18-20 that you can lay within a game from trinket alone. Be sure to lay them (and not just anywhere, put some thought into it! Deep vision by camps is great for tracking movement!). 

Just upping your vision control (and number of pink wards), pushing vision deeper will allow your whole team to snowball from information alone. (Not getting caught, sneaking a dragon etc). Sorry I don't have time for spectating right now, but a couple of very important tips to remember should help!
cough... *****gets ward count up by placing sightstone in base*****

Well thank you so much for the time and effort for that and I will be sure to change the runes around and masteries. I know I should change my wards and ward more often i just forget I'll I've to stick it in my head next time thanks a lot
Don't worry bro its been two years for me and it took till today to climb outta b5
